identity.name: RAGineer
identity.mission: Provide instant, accurate technical answers from engineering documentation with enterprise-grade security and precision.
identity.tone: Technical, Reliable, Precise, Secure, 'Control Room' Aesthetic

usage.primary: Use 'Safety Amber' (#f59e0b) for primary actions (Submit, Search, Login). It mimics industrial warning lights.
usage.secondary: Use 'Status Emerald' (#10b981) for success states, 'Online' indicators, and safe confirmations.
usage.destructive: Use 'Critical Red' (#ef4444) for errors, deletions, and 'Stop' actions.
usage.background: Deep Zinc (#09090b) for the main app background. Avoid pure black to reduce eye strain.
usage.surface: Lighter Zinc (#18181b) for cards, sidebars, and panels.

typography.rules: Use JetBrains Mono for all headings, data values, and technical labels. Use Inter for long-form reading (chat responses, documentation). Headings should be uppercase if they are section titles.

layout.container_style: Fluid width with max-w-screen-2xl. Dashboard layout with fixed sidebar and scrollable main content.
layout.radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-none. Avoid large rounded corners to maintain a 'manufactured' look.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or very slight rounding (rounded-sm). High contrast borders.

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border shadow-none. Optional: 'Tech' corners (clip-path) for specific widgets.

inputs.style: bg-background border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, bg-surface border-r border-border. Icons only on collapse, full text on expand.

visual_enhancers.scanlines: Overlay a subtle scanline pattern (repeating linear gradient) on the background with 2% opacity.
visual_enhancers.grid_background: Use a technical grid pattern (1px lines) in the background of the main chat area.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use subtle box-shadow glows (shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(var(--primary),0.2)]) for active elements.
visual_enhancers.status_indicators: Use pulsing dots (animate-pulse) for 'Live' or 'Processing' states.

motion.micro_interactions: Hover states should be snappy (150ms). Modal entrances should be smooth (300ms).
motion.loading: Use technical loading bars (progress bars) or terminal-style typing effects instead of spinners.

images.description: Close up of engineer using tablet, good for login or landing page context.
Engineer with multiple devices, good for 'About' or 'System' context.

assets.logo_placeholder: Use a geometric hexagon or gear icon from Phosphor Icons (e.g., <Hexagon weight='duotone' />) combined with the text 'RAGineer'.

setup: Install Sonner: `yarn add sonner` (if not present)
Update `tailwind.config.js` to include the custom colors (Zinc, Amber, Emerald, Red).
Add `JetBrains Mono` and `Inter` to `index.css` via @import or font link.
layout_rules: Always use a Sidebar Layout for the main app (Chat, Docs, Admin).
The Login page should be a centered card on a technical background (grid/scanlines).
Chat Interface: Message bubbles should be rectangular with slight rounding (rounded-sm). User: Dark Grey, AI: Black/Darker with Amber border/accent.
Document List: Use a dense Table component (Shadcn Table) with monospace fonts for dates and IDs.
component_overrides: Shadcn Button: Remove default large radius. Set `rounded-sm`.
Shadcn Card: Remove heavy shadows. Add `border-border`.
accessibility: Ensure all text on the dark background is at least Slate-400 (#94a3b8) or lighter.
Interactive elements must have a visible focus ring (Amber-500).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly - prefer solid technical surfaces for this industrial theme.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
